mapper.select: select case when count(1) >=1 then '0' when count(1)=0 then '1' end from deloitte.data_gov_grade where gov_code=#{qualFact00};

select ifnull(gov_tot_scor,-50) as score from deloitte.dm_fin_gov_scor t2 where t2.gov_code=#{qualFact00} and t2.data_year=(select max(data_year) from deloitte.dm_fin_gov_scor where gov_code=#{qualFact00})
select count(1) from deloitte.job_data t where t.`type`='C_M02' and t.job_state not in ('2','7')
mapper.update: update job_data set job_id = #{job_id} where crop_code = #{crop_code}
update job_data set job_state = #{exec_state} where job_id = #{instanceId}
mapper.select: select concat(t.type,'-',t1.date,'-',t.crop_code,'-',t.crop_name) from deloitte.job_data t, job_deta_data t1 where t1.crop_code=t.crop_code and t.job_id= #{instanceId} limit 1
